MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-NOV-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the SY15 postcode area of Llandyssil, affecting properties in Cefn Y Coed and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:55 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:12 pm on 27th November, 2020.
